results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum vs short-term reversal spread
results.description: Uses two high-coverage style loadings. Applied SUGGESTION1 (2 fields: momentum, strevrsl). SUGGESTION2 N/A (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage ~1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing high alphaCount fields. Kept KEEP_IN_MIND: <=2 datafields, simple operators. Confidence set to 0.78 because momentum and short-term reversal are complementary and well-used.

Long names with positive specific returns but negative sentiment (contrarian). SUGGESTION1 used daily_specific_return + sentmt. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied (high user/alpha count for sentmt). Respects KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence 0.72 due to reliable sentiment signal.

Short highly owned-by-hedge-funds stocks with weak idiosyncratic returns. SUGGESTION1 used hedge_fund_ownership_percent and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Preference for high userCount fields. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.74.

Favors momentum among smaller caps by scaling momentum with inverse market cap. SUGGESTION1 uses momentum and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Chose high userCount market cap. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence 0.70.

Long stocks with high prospect but low value loading. SUGGESTION1: prospect and value. No vector fields. ts_backfill not required. Used high alphaCount fields. Simple two-field operator. Confidence 0.68.
Combine residual volatility and earnings quality to find stable high-quality names. SUGGESTION1 applied with resvol & earnqlty. Coverage >0.6 so no backfill. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.66.
Look for momentum among higher dividend yield stocks. Used divyild and momentum fields per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields; coverage 1.0. Kept <=2 fields and few operators. Confidence 0.65.
Long stocks with rising short interest but strong short-term reversal loading (contrarian squeeze candidates). Used short_interest_factor_score and strevrsl. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.62.
Favor profitable, momentum small-cap names. Uses profit and size fields. SUGGESTION4 applied picking high alphaCount profit & size. KEEP_IN_MIND maintained. Confidence 0.69.
Short stocks with both high hedge fund ownership and positive sentiment (crowded positive). Used hedge_fund_ownership_percent and sentmt. No vectors. Confidence 0.63.
Long low specific risk and high recent specific return names. Applied daily_specific_return and specific_risk_variance per SUGGESTION1. Coverage fine. Confidence 0.67.
Long names where momentum exceeds value loading (momentum outpacing value). Used momentum and value. SUGGESTION4: fields have strong alphaCount. Confidence 0.66.
Exploit stocks with high prospect but weak mgmt quality where mispricings may exist. Used prospect and mgmtqlty. Coverage >0.6 so no backfill. Confidence 0.61.
Boost earnings-yield names showing positive momentum. Uses earnyild and momentum fields. SUGGESTION4 used high alphaCount earnyild. Confidence 0.64.
Use sentiment but neutralize large size by dividing by size. Uses sentmt and size. No vector fields; coverage adequate. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short crowded hedge funds with low momentum
results.description: Short names with high hedge-fund ownership but low momentum. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and momentum. Suggestion4 applied. Confidence 0.71.
Short stocks with unusually high residual volatility relative to their historical residual returns. Uses resvol and daily_specific_return. Coverage good; kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.59.
Favor names with strong specific returns and high prospect loading. Uses daily_specific_return and prospect. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.
Hedge fund ownership signal adjusted versus market loading to reduce beta exposure. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and market. Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.65.
Identify small-cap names with high short interest (higher short-squeeze risk). Uses short_interest_factor_score and size. SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.62.
Long high earnings-quality low leverage firms. Uses earnqlty and leverage. Coverage earnqlty ~0.9512 (>0.6) so no backfill. Confidence 0.66.
Favor names where profit loading is high but momentum is stronger (growth with price action). Used profit and momentum. Confidence 0.63.
Long small caps with low prospect (mean-reversion bet). Uses size and prospect. Chosen to diversify. Confidence 0.55 (contrarian, lower conviction).
Short names with high specific risk and low prospect. Uses specific_risk_variance and prospect. Coverage ok; minimal operators. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Dividend-yield vs hedge fund ownership spread
results.description: Long high dividend yield but low hedge fund ownership (under-owned income plays). Uses divyild and hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Residual volatility scaled by market cap
results.description: Favor lower resvol in large caps (stability). Uses resvol and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.60.
Long names with rising momentum and high short interest (squeeze candidates). Uses momentum and short_interest_factor_score. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Specific return over size (idiosyncratic small cap bet)
results.description: Favor high daily_specific_return among smaller caps. Uses daily_specific_return and size. Suggestion4 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Long names with high prospect but low market sentiment (undervalued potential). Uses prospect and sentmt. Chose high alphaCount fields. Confidence 0.64.
Long high earnings yield but low profit loading (value trapped). Uses earnyild and profit. Coverage good. Confidence 0.60.
Short stocks with persistent high short interest but negative prospect vs market. Uses short_interest_factor_score and market. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership count momentum filter
results.description: Use ownership count and momentum — long names with rising momentum and few HF holders (discovery). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_count and momentum. SUGGESTION4: high counts. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Size-neutral momentum divided by specific risk
results.description: Favor momentum adjusted downward by specific risk; keeps exposure size-neutral. Uses momentum, specific_risk_variance. Coverage ok, operators minimal. Confidence 0.66.

Long low residual volatility names while short high resvol. Uses resvol and daily_specific_return. Kept simple. Confidence 0.61.
Favor high dividend yield among small caps for yield-seeking alpha. Uses divyild and size. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.59.
